divs: sighting detailsapproximately at around 10:00pm\cst here in north padre island texas, the closest city being corpus christi, tx., which is about 20 minutes from where we were this evening of july 2002, sitting around a beach fire was my boyfriend and i. i love looking at the stars so i was 90% completely lounged back in a beach chair gazing at the stars, when all of a sudden i saw a triangular formation of 3 lights in the sky. they were moving very slowly at about 2 mph. i could see what appeared like a very light yellowish white laser lines connecting all three lights which made it appear as one large object. i'm almost convinced it was one large object the size of a football field about 3-4 miles in the sky, because you couldn't see any stars through this triangular formation. ----all of a sudden as i spotted it, i said to my boyfriend: "oh my god! what the hell is that, as i pointed up at the sky at this object.....my boyfriend also said: "oh my god!----as he saw the object too.....the object proceeded to move forward at about 2 mph and then it slowly turned at an angle towards the left. as it turned slowly to change direction, the 3 lights faded out or turned off completely, and the object could not be seen anymore by us that night..........i want to state that i'm convinced this was not some "stealth bomber" from the nearby army base, because they are wide triangular aircraft........this object that we saw was a very long triangular object the size or length of a football field, and made no noise whatsoever as it propelled itself somehow. to me, it was definitely not any kind of aircraft that i've ever seen, because i love jets and aircraft. as far as i'm concerned, it was not any type of aircraft from this world!-----i don't care what anybody says!----completely and truthfully told......a beachbum from corpus christi, tx!---ps...and don't think i was smoking anything funny to have seen this, because i have no respect for drugs or druggies!
